snippet: The crash brought the American death toll on Monday to seven, making it the deadliest day this year for United States forces.
abstract: Five American soldiers are killed in helicopter crash in southern Afghanistan; cause of crash is under investigation.
lead_paragraph: The crash brought the American death toll on Monday to seven, making it the deadliest day this year for United States forces.

headline.seo: 5 American Soldiers Killed in Helicopter Crash in Afghanistan
headline.main: 5 U.S. Soldiers Are Killed in Air Crash in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: 5 U.S. Soldiers Are Killed In Air Crash in Afghanistan
